title: Virat Kohli:Virat Kohli Goes Past Sachin Tendulkar And Virender Sehwag, Now Has The Most Test Double Hundreds By An Indian
text:
Virat Kohli Goes Past Sachin Tendulkar And Virender Sehwag, Now Has The Most Test Double Hundreds By An Indian

Virat Kohli Goes Past Sachin Tendulkar And Virender Sehwag, Now Has The Most Test Double Hundreds By An Indian

Not happy with just a century, Virat Kohli registered his 7th Test 200 as India piled on the runs vs South Africa on Day 2 in Pune. As a result, Kohli now has the most Test 200s by an Indian. He went past Sachin Tendulkar and Virender Sehwag who both have 6.

Cricinfo

He is also tied in 4th position in the overall list with Walter Hammond and Mahela Jayawardene. With time on his side, there is no reason why he cannot go past Don Bradman's world record of 12.

Kohli was 63 not out overnight and registered his 26th Test ton in the first session. His 200 came just after Tea as he ended the 2nd session on 194. His double ton took 295 balls and contained 28 fours.

Cricinfo

Don't Miss 135 SHARES 462 SHARES 332 SHARES 425 SHARES

He also went past 7000 runs in Tests, the third fastest for India after the same people he went past in the 200 column. As India approach the 500-mark, South Africa clearly have their backs to the wall.
